title: How to upgrade an iPhone 7 to iOS 13 - Quora

response.answer_text: When* iOS 13 is available; Start your phone.Connect it to a computer running iTunes with a proper cable.Tell the phone you trust the computer. Tell the computer you want to access the phone.Take a full back up.Then Option 1, in iTunes while the phone is still connected to the computer. Press the “Check for Update” button in iTunes.Accept the agreement and follow instructions.Option 2. On the phone when disconnected from the computer. Go to Settings.Go to General -> Software UpdateWait for it to check whether any updates are available.When it shows, choose to Install it.* At the time of answering this question, iOS 13 had not been released yet. Chances are it will be available on 19 Sep when new hardware comes out. What is available is a public Beta release. Do not install the beta unless 1. You are a software developer or tester and you absolutely need it for your work, or 2. You are checking it out on a secondary device set aside specifically for that purpose, not your day to day phone upon which your life depends.

The iPhone 7 is officially supported by the new iOS, which has not yet been released. When it is released on September 19th, you will be able to upgrade directly through the Settings app that’s built in.
Yes. iPhone 6s(+)iPhone SEiPhone 7(+)iPhone 8(+)iPhone XiPhone XRiPhone XS (Max)support iOS 13
